scenario_text.value:
What’s this...? There’s a bunch of stuff
floating in the air.

You think it’s those whatchamacallits?
Spores?

I’ve never heard of red spider lilies doing
something like this.
These things aren’t bad for us, are they?

Flowers like these can be found anywhere.
I mean, they look pretty normal...

(Everyone’s just standing around in confused
silence. We have no idea what’s going on.)
